document.full_text: health secretary andrew lansley apologized for the poor communication of his health reforms and said changes would be made to draft legislation after nurses passed a vote of no confidence in him.
document.title: lansley says sorry to nurses over uk health reforms
lines_and_colors: health secretary andrew lansley apologized for the poor communication of his health reforms and said changes would be made to draft legislation after nurses passed a vote of no confidence in him.
